name: Saying Goodbye (PixelHole, Lucas Z)
description:
Saying Goodbye is about Saying Goodbye to your friend for one last time

accompany  Flyn the Cat as they journey through the mystical park of Floral cliffs!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD : Movement
  • E : Interaction/Conversation

characters may have more conversations than one. interacting with them more times than once can lead to more conversations.

if you encounter any bugs or glitches. sadly the only suggestions i can offer is to reload the page

and you can report them to me at my Discord:  PixelHoleᵀᴹ#2722

This Project was made by :

  • PixelHole : Art, Programming, writing
  • Lucas Z : Writing, Music
  • Ibrahim Hisham : Ibralogue Dialogue System
  • Keldingul: additional Art
  • Wokarol: Writing
  • Ktyl: Writing

And was made for the Brackeys GameJam 2022.2
